extensionDescription.message: Selectively prevent specific webpages from leaving a browsing history in the browser based on the user-configured domain list.

popupDescription1.message: To block all subdomains under a domain, simply enter the root domain, e.g., tsukistar.cc. To specify a particular subdomain, enter the full domain, e.g., blog.tsukistar.cc.

popupDescription2.message: When entering multiple domains, use one per line, separated by a comma.

popupDescription3.message: Entered domains will be saved automatically. Note: If the domain format is incorrect, it will not be saved, and a prompt will appear.
